name: APO - 003 (Evilmon)
description:
APO is summoned from merging 0.8 EVIL with a corrupt politician. Older politicians, and politicians that produced misery create a bigger and stronger APO. 
The politician dies in the process and gets possessed by APO. After a short while, the politician becomes APO.

APO is one of the most dangerous level 1 EVILMON because of its ability to evolve into the worst kind of apocalyptic monsters. 

The bubbles around APO are reminiscents of worlds that the creature and its kind destroyed. By collecting ruined world visions, APO gets stronger and stronger.

APO has been airsummoned to every wallet that owns EVIL coin and was following @EvilCoin_tez on Tuesday 24th of August 2021.

APO is a level 1 EVILMON.
APO can evolve.
